1. [![Berkeley Township News](https://www.berkeleytownship.org/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=855)](https://www.berkeleytownship.org/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=32)

   #### [Property Assessment Revaluation](https://www.berkeleytownship.org/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=32)

   The Ocean County Board of Taxation has ordered a revaluation to be completed and implemented by the 2027 Tax Year. Inspections will begin in December 2025 as mandated by the Ocean County Board of Taxation. [Read on...](https://www.berkeleytownship.org/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=32)
2. [![](https://www.berkeleytownship.org/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=1137)](https://www.berkeleytownship.org/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=27)

   #### [Recycle Coach](https://www.berkeleytownship.org/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=27)

   Stay on top of your garbage and recycling schedule with Recycle Coach! [Read on...](https://www.berkeleytownship.org/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=27)
3. [![Berkeley Township News](https://www.berkeleytownship.org/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=855)](https://www.berkeleytownship.org/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=34)

   #### [Christmas Tree Pick-Up](https://www.berkeleytownship.org/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=34)

   Berkeley Township will begin picking up Christmas trees on January 5th, 2026 and continue throughout the month. Please have the tree curbside for pick-up and be sure to remove all ornaments and hooks. [Read on...](https://www.berkeleytownship.org/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=34)
4. [![](https://www.berkeleytownship.org/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=1137)](https://www.berkeleytownship.org/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=35)

   #### [Message From The Mayor](https://www.berkeleytownship.org/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=35)

   As we begin the new year, Mayor John Bacchione extends his best wishes to our community, provides an update on the township's revaluation, and outlines our continued focus as we move forward into the year ahead. [Read on...](https://www.berkeleytownship.org/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=35)

[View All News](https://www.berkeleytownship.org/CivicAlerts.aspx?CID=1,9,6,8,7)
